name: Hudson Mind
tagline: We do not break code, we break rules.
description:
Hudson Mind helps its clients deploy digital strategy and leverage technology to reach and engage their audience, empower their brand and outperform their business goals.
Thanks to 15+ years of business & digital experience on 3 continents - America, Europe & Asia - the team serves its clients worldwide with a strong understanding of New York business challenges. Visit our website for more information.
